item.description:
Xanadu
OK, I admit it, I was a huge Olivia Newton-John fan as a kid and saw the movie Xanadu a gazillion times, campy as it was. That aside, even the cynics are saying the Broadway musical is a blast! I'm thinking this MIGHT be better than Mama Mia.

Summary: It's the 1980s film turned into a Broadway musical. Greek goddesses on roller skates, campy love story and catchy pop tunes. How can that not be fun?

It's hard to find any good videos, but here's a commercial for the show.

Meetup details: I chose a Wednesday night because tickets are a little cheaper. I am getting rear or side Orchestra seats. The ticket + those outrageous handling fees (PPAC site, Amazon) = $55. When you RSVP, please pay online. If I can't get tickets, I will refund your money. The deadline to RSVP is 5 pm Jan. 7.

The show starts at 7:30 pm, and we will meet in the lobby of PPAC at 7 p.m. Afterward, we'll grab dinner/drinks/apps/dessert somewhere nearby -- TBD.
item.name: Xanadu -- PPAC
